author: fwyzard
body:
#### PR description:

This PR adds new packages to test the usage of CUDA libraries for device code. It does not implement any tests for CMSSW plugins (yet).
It does not aim to be merged in its current form.

The package `HeterogeneousCore/CUDATestDevice` implements a library that defines and exports CUDA device-only functions, and a test that uses them.

The package `HeterogeneousCore/CUDATestKernel` implements a library that imports device functions from `HeterogeneousCore/CUDATestDevice` to define and export CUDA kernels, and a test that uses them.

The package `HeterogeneousCore/CUDATestWrapper` implements a library that imports kernels from `HeterogeneousCore/CUDATestKernel` to define and export host-only wrappers around them, usable by non-CUDA libraries, plugins and applications, and implements a test that uses them.


#### PR validation:

The new unit tests compile and pass.
title: Add a test for CUDA library build rules
